data.title: Zip Lines and Adventure Courses in Flagstaff, AZ
data.meta_description: Flagstaff Extreme offers tree top suspended zip line and obstacle courses. Book your zip line or adventure course experience in beautiful Flagstaff, AZ.
data.text:
Adventure Course – $60 per guest + taxes and fees

Hours of tree-to-tree adventure filled with obstacles, action elements, and ziplines all on our Adventure Course! Course completion time varies depending on guest volume and how many breaks you take throughout the course. There’s no time limit on the course as long as it’s completed before sunset!

Height requirement

While keeping feet flat on the ground and arms raised above your head, palm of hand must be able to touch the height of 5’11″.

Age related requirements

Participants must be 12+.

Ages 12-15 must have a waiver completed by their parent or legal guardian and be accompanied by an adult in the ratio of 3 children to one adult.

Ages 16-17 must have a waiver completed by their parent or legal guardian but may participate without an adult up on the course with them.

Adventure Ziplines – $60 per guest + taxes and fees

Hours of tree-to-tree adventure as you zipline your way through 32 ziplines! You may even run into some fun surprises along the way!

Height requirement

While keeping feet flat on the ground and arms raised above your head, palm of hand must be able to touch the height of 5’11″.

Age related requirements

Participants must be 12+.

Ages 12-15 must have a waiver completed by their parent or legal guardian and be accompanied by an adult in the ratio of 3 children to one adult.

Ages 16-17 must have a waiver completed by their parent or legal guardian but may participate without an adult up on the course with them.

Kid’s Course – $30 + taxes and fees – Ages 7-11

An active, fun way for kids to challenge themselves while completing obstacles, ziplines, and ladders! This course is designed for kids aged 7-11, all other participants can interact from the ground through encouragement, obstacle shaking (and maybe even some pine cone throwing). Your kid’s imagination will run wild as they pass through each challenge!

Height requirement

While keeping feet flat on the ground and arms raised above your head, palm of hand must be able to touch the height of 4’7″.

Age related requirements

Participants must be 7-11.

All minors must have a waiver completed by their parent or legal guardian.

Must be accompanied by adult 18+ (adult observes child from the ground)

The Adult may not leave the child without supervision.

Private Guiding – $60 + taxes and fees

For participants aged 12-15 who do not have an adult to climb with them, you can hire a professional Flagstaff Extreme Guide! Our Guides will ensure they have a great experience, show them the ins and outs of the course, help them through the obstacles, and even reveal some of our favorite tips and tricks. Please call to book a guide in advance to ensure availability.

Note: If our Guides or Staff determine a child participating should not continue due to difficulty or any other reason, child must come down from the course which he or she is participating on.

Discounts

Group discounts

Groups: 10% for groups of 8 or more, all booking the same activity. (use coupon code GRP2024)

Click for Group Brochure

Other discounts

10% for Active Military personnel with ID*

10% for College Students with ID*

30% Senior (60 and up). Are you up for the challenge? Complete all adult courses and receive a FREE FLG X Shirt!*

* Only one discount can be applied and are subject to change

Inclement Weather Policy

Flagstaff Extreme operates RAIN/SNOW or SHINE. Only severe weather conditions such as lightning in close proximity (6 miles), high winds (over 40 mph), fire conditions, extreme cold and/or possibly heavy rain/snow will temporarily close the courses.

In the event that we close the Park and guests have been waiting for over an hour, guests can receive a RAIN CHECK* or REFUND provided they have completed only two or less of the Courses. Customers that have progressed through 2 Courses and are on the 3rd Course or further will be issued a RAIN CHECK*

Additionally, during the months of December, January and February, when we operate we will do so when the temperature is above 25 degrees. You may reschedule (if the temperature is below our threshold) to a future date in our Winter Season, but we do not offer any refunds.

* RAIN CHECKS are valid for 60 days from issue or the current season year whichever is sooner.
